metadata.title: CVE-2021-22228 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions before13.11.6, all versions starting from 13.12 before 13.12.6, and all versionsstarting from 14.0 before 14.0.2. Improper access control allowsunauthorised users to access project details using Graphql.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
